6. Sum up the total number of races Jackie Oliver (Gold Leaf Team Lotus) competed in from 1967 to 1977: The calculation is based on our findings that Gold Leaf Team Lotus participated in 5 races from 1967-1969, and no further entries were made for them after 1969.
